original_title: Psalms & Proverbs with the Song of Solomon
overview: Experience the entirety of Psalms, Proverbs and the Song of Solomon in this program blending the moving narration of Emmy Award winner Stephen Johnston, powerful music and a cast of Tony-winning actors who bring the tales to vivid life. You'll view these three books from the King James version of the Bible in a whole new light as the stories of beauty and wisdom unfold.
title: Psalms & Proverbs with the Song of Solomon
